attributes.title: THIS APP IS GARBAGE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i heard if we downloaded it it would bring back my favorite netflix shows but once i opened the app none of my shows were announced as renewed??!??!!?!? mr orange i am disappointed in this app, it is not well designed at all, the layout is ugly, and overall just a really bad app

attributes.title: I really tried
attributes.review: I was finally accepting trump as our president. I really tried to like him, but I just couldn’t his plans are terrible. I really think y’all need to get the app and see this ugly racist Cheetos plans for our country. I’m disgusted to call this racist a president. I seriously think people who voted for this orange Cheeto re-think electing him.

attributes.title: ...Terrible!
attributes.review: In the words of our President... Terrible! This app should’ve been a YUGE success! Instead I am YUGELY disappointed. Mr. President deserves PRESIDENTIAL HARASSMENT for this. The app is a insult to THE AMAZING economy we currently have right now. It glitches so much and made my phone OVERHEAT!!! Whatevs Trump. You’ve lost my vote for the 2020 election. I think I speak for many other when I say that this app is TERRIBLE!

attributes.title: I can’t even stand this guy anymore
attributes.review: Trump has done so much to mess up what previous presidents like Obama have done, he is limiting rights of others and gassing people who are peacefully protesting. I would beg that Obama somehow come into a 3rd presidency and somehow mend this country back together after trump just took America and threw it into a meat grinder

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app made my phone get a virus and now because of this app my phone glitches 24/7 and it was asking for to much personal information that I didn’t feel comfortable sharing with this app because they were sending my information to China

attributes.title: it’s like if a cheeto threw up
attributes.review: this is such a disgrace to have this person controlling our fascist police state that is disguised as a democracy. This app just makes that situation even worse. trying to get... re-elected 🤢🤮 no thank you this is a waste of your time and energy. id rather take the other accused racist instead of trump 🤢

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded it to support our amazing president, but after using it I noticed some things were happening. I started seeing everything in the color orange! I saw no more colors but orange, and every so often I would hear things like “TRUMP IS NOT RACIST” or “TRUMP IS NOT SEXIST” which is all lies. I will not be using this app anymore and I do not recommend it #DUMPTRUMP

attributes.title: I died 😋🥰🤮🤢🤒🥴😈😴🤐🤒😯😧😪😴🤔🤬😓😥😳😳😤😤😟🥳😩😫😟😭😭🤯😤🥵🥶🥺🥰😜☺️
attributes.review: It all started when I got this app... first off, my cat died after he turned orange and lost all his hair. Then he was coughing up toupees. RIP😿💀👹👽 this became a cycle with all my family members, they all died 😤😱🤯 this began happening to me and now I’m living my last couple of seconds. GOODBYE DEADLY APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT. Uh oh- I’m dead 😵💨 (⬅️my last breath)

attributes.title: It tried to kill me
attributes.review: When I opened the app it said you must vote for trump or were sending the army then I didn’t vote for trump and if sent a army of ants I’m scared then it hacked into my phone and leaked my search history now every one know how to get free robuxs I was charging people. Don’t download this app and give it a one star

attributes.title: ✨Horrible✨
attributes.review: Seriously has to be the worst app i’ve ever interacted with!! i messy and full of redundant spam of stupid men! i mean how am i supposed to learn about our great Trumpkin when all that’s on here is dumb boys arguing like children! oh and my phone crashed trying to open it several times so i guess there’s that too
